alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:51PM MDT until August 05 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 451 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wild Horse Point, or 37 miles north of La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arlington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
